groom.name: Aromal
groom.bio: A loving son, dedicated professional, and someone who values family traditions. Looking forward to building a beautiful life together with the blessings of our families.

bride.name: Jesna
bride.bio: A cherished daughter, kind-hearted soul, and someone who treasures family values. Excited to start this new journey with love and the support of our families.

wedding.title: Wedding Ceremony
wedding.description: We joyfully invite you to witness and celebrate our wedding

siteContent.heroSubtitle: You are invited to celebrate the wedding of
siteContent.personalizedGreeting: Hi {name}, you are invited to celebrate the wedding of
siteContent.meetTheCoupleDescription: Our story is made of little moments, shared laughter, and countless prayers. From strangers to best friends, and now partners for life, we step into this new journey hand in hand‚Äîguided by love and surrounded by those who mean the most to us.
siteContent.celebrationDescription: Every moment we share is a celebration of love and joy. We can't wait to create beautiful memories together with you.
siteContent.ctaDescription: We would be honored to have you celebrate this special day with us. Please RSVP by December 1st, 2025.
